name: The Case of the Crafting Bench
desc: You discover a strange Crafting Bench in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame...

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Interact with the Crafting Bench at <color=#ece5d8>Temple of Pax</color> in <color=#ece5d8>Stadium of the Sacred Flame</color>
<color=#ffffff>Rewards</color>

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.text:
<color=#ece5d8>Stadium of the Sacred Flame: Temple of Pax, Natlan</color>
<color=#ffffff>Interactive Map:</color>

Go to the clearing near the <color=#ece5d8>Stadium of the Sacred Flame</color>
Talk to Sumac
Duel against Sumac
Talk to Sumac
Check on Sumac's condition
Go to the outdoor training area to collect testimony
Ask Ogun some questions
Talk to Ogun
Complete Ogun's challenge
Talk to Ogun
Talk to Pampa
Complete Pampa's challenge
Talk to Pampa
Go to the <color=#ece5d8>People of the Springs</color> to meet Anela
Ask Anela some questions
Talk to Anela
Complete Anela's challenge
Talk to Anela
Return to the <color=#ece5d8>Stadium of the Sacred Flame</color>
Talk to Sumac
Go to the outdoor training area after two days
Go to the outdoor training area
Talk to Sumac
Submit the victims' testimonies to the judge
Keep listening
Submit the purchase invoice to the judge
Keep listening
Chase Tozan to the destination
Follow Tozan via his footprints
Talk to Tozan
Defeat the opponents
Talk to Tozan
Go to the <color=#ece5d8>Stadium of the Sacred Flame</color> and report to the judge

customize.name: Ogun's Testimony
customize.desc: A record of Ogun's testimony. It contains clearly-listed information on the time of Crafting Bench usage and purpose, and the victim's condition.

customize.name: Pampa's Testimony
customize.desc: A record of Pampa's testimony. Many exaggerations and redundancies in information make this one much harder to parse.

customize.name: The Locusts' Purchase Invoice
customize.desc: Amidst these items, only the reason for and quantity of the Loach Pearl purchase seems out of place.

customize.name: Anela's Testimony
customize.desc: A record of Anela's testimony. Seems like the content is not short on criticism of the Hawkwings, either...

value.text: The Case of the Crafting Bench
